summary: The diff implements a 2-slide Hug Day slideshow with slide transitions, ambient heart/petal effects, and a music toggle. However, it appears to introduce Internet Identity/auth scaffolding (a non-goal) and does not provide evidence that the required generated image assets exist under the specified public path. There is also a mismatch with the required *exact* bottom-note text, and the text fade-in animation may not re-trigger on slide activation because slides remain mounted.

missing_requirements.requirement: Show the exact bottom note text: “Cant hug u physically right now so sending u the virtual ones”.
missing_requirements.reason: The implemented bottom note text differs from the required exact string (uses "Can't" instead of "Cant").

missing_requirements.requirement: Fade-in animation for headline and bottom note when the slide appears, synchronized with the slide transition.
missing_requirements.reason: Slides are all rendered at once (absolute-positioned) and the text uses a static CSS animation class. With no remount or active-state-driven keying, the fade-in may only run on initial page load rather than each time a slide becomes active.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (hug-day scene + heart + petal) and wire them into the slideshow.
missing_requirements.reason: The code references the generated asset paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (assets may be among omitted files, but there is no explicit evidence).

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider added to the app composition (non-goal: no authentication/account system).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists authentication as a non-goal and says not to add it if not needed, but the app is wrapped with InternetIdentityProvider and includes identity/actor hooks.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query client setup and actor/query scaffolding for a backend-less slideshow.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; BuildRequest describes a frontend slideshow with no persistence and no auth needs, yet react-query and actor hooks are included.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution link to caffeine.ai added to the slideshow page.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest requirements or acceptance criteria.
